title: Oatmello - Light in the Window
description:
Official Animated Music Video for 'Light in the Window' by Oatmello

Over a year in the making, Soft Landing is a dynamic and personal collection from Eugene, Oregon based producer Oatmello. Unafraid of open space and mellow tones, these 7 songs dance and play around soft piano and guitar lines that take flight; elated and free. 

Soft Landing is presented on a Limited Edition White Vinyl, paired alongside a previous EP Between Us. The Vinyl features the brilliant artwork from Baby Eyez, with a printed inner sleeve with a comic layout of the still frames from the accompanying animation for "Light in the Window".
